WRITING.TEXT: Thanks for the response! Appreciate it

Not qualified yet but rather in my final year at university.
I'm in process of designing a teaching and learning program on WW1. I have my own list of resources which I am using and want to see what others have available in terms of resources that I don't have. Everything that's been mentioned I already have. Rather than being condescending and try and defame my credibility as a teacher, I would suggest asking instead of assuming

WRITING.TITLE: Teaching Resources - WW1
WRITING.TEXT:
Hi everyone,
I am looking for resources to help teach WW1 on the following:
- Significant events and the experiences of Australians at war - Impact of the wars on Australia - Significance of the wars to Australia - Commemorations and the nature of the ANZAC legend - The scope and nature of warfare
Thanks!

WRITING.TITLE: History Pedagogy
WRITING.TEXT:
Hi All,
I have a university assessment due which requires me to include pedagogy linked to history Can anyone help me out?
Thanks!
